channel.title: 🏢 Google Cloud AI Research on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Google Cloud AI Research on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Chain of Agents: Large Language Models Collaborating on Long-Context Tasks
item.description: Chain-of-Agents (CoA) framework uses multi-agent collaboration to efficiently process long contexts for LLMs, significantly improving performance on various tasks.
